analysis.description:
BoomerangLiquidity.payout (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#89-112) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- weak_hands.buy.value(investment)(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#94)

Reentrancy in BoomerangLiquidity.payout (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#89-112):
	External calls:
	- weak_hands.buy.value(investment)(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#94)
	- participants[payoutOrder].etherAddress.call.value(payoutToSend).gas(1000000)() (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#101-104)
	External calls sending eth:
	- weak_hands.buy.value(investment)(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#94)
	- ! participants[payoutOrder].etherAddress.send(payoutToSend) (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#99-105)
	- participants[payoutOrder].etherAddress.call.value(payoutToSend).gas(1000000)() (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#101-104)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payoutOrder (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#109-110)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol:
	Contract POWH has payable functions:
	 - buy (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#16-17)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BoomerangLiquidity.payout (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#89-112) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-weak_hands.buy.value(investment)(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#94)

BoomerangLiquidity.payout has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! participants[payoutOrder].etherAddress.send(payoutToSend) (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#99-105)

BoomerangLiquidity.payout has external calls inside a loop:
	- participants[payoutOrder].etherAddress.call.value(payoutToSend).gas(1000000)() (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#101-104)

Reentrancy in BoomerangLiquidity.payout (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#89-112):
	External calls:
	- weak_hands.buy.value(investment)(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#94)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participants (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#98)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '' of POWH.buy (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#16) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.changeOwner (/unique_contracts/0x7183169973eda16209f66a602f2e27e1303bf414.sol#34-35) is not in mixedCase
